# Liebherr2 Patternlib Next

## yalc global installieren

```bash
npm install -g yalc
```

## Single Build 

```bash
npm install
npm run build
```

## Watch Build + Publish via Yalc

```bash
npm install
npm yalc:watch
```

## Build+Open Storybook

```bash
npm run storybook
```

## Command Archive

```bash
yalc publish --push
```
